name: brian-skinner
body:
# Code Samples If you're interested in seeing examples of code that I've written, here are links to projects that I've worked on over the years. | Year | Languages | Tools | Project | Details | |:----:|:--------- |:----- |:------- |:------- | | 2011 | Java | [Google App Engine](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_App_Engine) | Translation workflow tool | This is a small open source project from my time at Google. I did the design and most of the coding, with contributions from a volunteer I recruited.
http://code.google.com/p/translation-workflow/ | | 2008 | Python,
JavaScript | Django,
Google App Engine | OpenRecord wiki 2008 | This is a quick and dirty experiment I did when I was teaching myself Python, App Engine, and Django.
http://svn.dojotoolkit.org/openrecord/redux/trunk/openrecord/ | | 2007 | JavaScript | Dojo | CSV file reader | source: http://svn.dojotoolkit.org/src/dojox/trunk/data/CsvStore.js
unit tests: http://svn.dojotoolkit.org/src/dojox/trunk/data/tests/stores/CsvStore.js | | 2007 | JavaScript | Dojo | UUID utilities | http://svn.dojotoolkit.org/src/dojox/trunk/uuid/ | | 2007 | JavaScript | Dojo | OpenRecord wiki | code: http://svn.dojotoolkit.org/openrecord/classic/trunk/
screencast: http://openrecord.org/screencast/2006-02-21/OpenRecord.html| | 2004 | JavaScript | | Pivot-table demo | A simple demo I wrote when I was first teaching myself JavaScript.
http://gumption.org/2004/pivot_table/ | | 2004 | JavaScript | | Boardgame dice roller | A toy I wrote to teach myself JavaScript.
http://gumption.org/2004/dice/ | # Little Hacks These next ones aren't real programming projects, just little hacks to get things done, but they may serve as examples of attempts at practical problem solving. | Year | Languages | Tools | Project | Details | |:----:|:--------- |:----- |:------- |:------- | | 2013 | HTML, CSS | | Photo viewer | Done using only HTML and CSS, **without** JavaScript.
http://www.vollershouse.org/photos.html | | 2013 | HTML, CSS | | Floorplan | Just for fun, vector graphics done only using only HTML and CSS, **without** canvas or SVG.
http://www.vollershouse.org/floorplan.html | | 2006 | JavaScript | MediaWiki | Bar charts | http://www.charityscorecard.org/wiki/CharityScorecard:Show_more.js | | 2006 | JavaScript | MediaWiki | Interactive bar charts | http://www.charityscorecard.org/wiki/CharityScorecard:Custom_scorecard.js | | 2006 | JavaScript | MediaWiki | disclosure links | http://www.charityscorecard.org/wiki/CharityScorecard:Show_more.js |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
